Tables.​ADC_ACTION_PARAM_VISUAL_TYPES

Table to store how a parameter type has to be displayed. Options are TEXT, TEXT_AREA, SELECT/STATIC_LIST and SWITCH

Fields
cpv_id

PK, technical key

cpv_pti_id

Reference to PIT_TRANSLATABLE_ITEM, translatable NAME

cpv_pmg_name

Reference to PIT_TRANSLATABLE_ITEM, Fixed value ADC

cpv_sort_seq

Sort criteria

cpv_active

Flag to indicate whether visual type is in use
